title: IOCTL_DISK_FIND_NEW_DEVICES (ntdddisk.h)
description: The IOCTL_DISK_FIND_NEW_DEVICES IOCTL is replaced by IOCTL_STORAGE_FIND_NEW_DEVICES In Microsoft Windows 2000 and later operating systems.
